titles.title: A bill to amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to authorize the Secretary of Homeland Security to establish a continuous diagnostics and mitigation program in the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency of the Department of Homeland Security, and for other purposes.
Advancing Cybersecurity Diagnostics and Mitigation Act
Advancing Cybersecurity Diagnostics and Mitigation Act
Advancing Cybersecurity Diagnostics and Mitigation Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
